metadata.dc:title: Cutout Summer
metadata.dc:creator: Nicola Magri
metadata.dc:subject: Pain
Escape
Summer
metadata.dcterms:abstract: This memory is provided by Nicola Magri. He is an illustrator and he wants to show the his expectations about summer 2020 during the COVID-19 emergency.
metadata.dc:description: L'illustrazione racconta un modo di vivere l'estate 2020: tra spiagge semi-vuote popolate solo dall'immaginazione di chi ha la possibilit√† di andarci veramente. The illustration tells a way of living the summer 2020: between semi-empty beaches populated only by the imagination of those who have the opportunity to really go there.
